hero.badge: No. 1 Content Creator Media Platform in Indonesia
hero.subtitle: Learn directly from practitioner mentors. Measured curriculum, supportive community, and access to various collaboration opportunities.

products.title: OUR PROGRAMS
products.subtitle: Featured Programs for Content Creators
products.description: Choose the program that suits your needs and level in the world of content creation.

pricing.title: Mentoring Packages
pricing.subtitle: Choose the package that suits your needs and goals in becoming a professional content creator.

checkout.title: Order Confirmation
checkout.disclaimer: By clicking confirm, the system will record your order as Pending and you will be redirected to WhatsApp for manual payment verification by our team.

silver.name: COMMUNITY (SILVER)
silver.tagline: For beginners who want to enter the world of content creators and learn together with the community.
silver.whatsapp: Hello SMI! I want to join the Community Package (Silver) Rp50.000.

premium.name: MENTORING (PREMIUM)
premium.tagline: 1-on-1 face-to-face mentoring sessions with professional mentors or the founder of Sekolah Mentor Indonesia.
premium.whatsapp: Hello SMI! I want to book a Mentoring session (Premium) Rp100.000/hour.

coaching.name: PRIVATE EXCLUSIVE (COACHING)
coaching.tagline: Intensive coaching for companies, large communities, or institutions that want to invite Sekolah Mentor Indonesia mentors.
coaching.whatsapp: Hello SMI! I want to inquire about the Private Exclusive Package (Coaching) for agencies/companies.

library.title: Learning Library
library.subtitle: Free and curated materials to start your journey as a content creator.

empty_state.title: Content Coming Soon
empty_state.description: Our mentor team is curating the best materials so you can learn with the right direction. All content will be added gradually through the admin dashboard.

community.title: SMI Creator Community
community.subtitle: A meeting place for creators to share, collaborate, and grow together in a supportive ecosystem.

benefits.title: Exclusive Networking
benefits.description: Connect with hundreds of creators from various niches to unlock collaboration opportunities.

benefits.title: Sharing & Discussion
benefits.description: Experience sharing sessions and practical tips you won't find in public tutorials.

benefits.title: Regular Events
benefits.description: Access to member-only online and offline meetups to strengthen community bonds.

benefits.title: Support System
benefits.description: A positive environment that supports your creative career journey from scratch.

items.name: Andi Wijaya
items.story: I used to be confused about how to start, after joining mentoring at SMI, now I can collaborate with gadget brands.

items.name: Siska Putri
items.story: The community is very supportive. The video editing material is very practical for beginners like me.

items.name: Budi Santoso
items.story: The mentoring package is very worth it. My mindset about content changed completely after learning here.

items.name: Lia Amalia
items.story: From zero to having my own creative team. Thank you SMI for the guidance!

cta.title: Learning doesn't have to be expensive to start
cta.subtitle: Start from free content, continue with structured mentoring with experienced mentors.
